text: “Alipo ena mwa iwo omwe akukumvetsera (ukamawerenga Qur’an), ndipo taika zitsekero pa mitima yawo kuti asazindikire (chifukwa cha machimo awo omwe akhala akuchita), ndi m’makutu mwawo kulemera kwa ugonthi; ndipo akaona chozizwitsa chilichonse, sakuchikhulupirira, kufikira akakudzera kudzakangana nawe, awo amene sadakhulupirire akuti: “Izi (zimene utilankhulazi), sikanthu koma ndi nkhani zopeka za anthu akale.”
